rukus.text: 83|1|Dhbansa sihamtara babe yihamte jokha-makhata kama diye
83|2|yihamte anara paraa mapi la'omte purnamatraata grahana karae
83|3|arau yetiya sihamtaka mapi diye athaba ojana karai diye, tetiya kama diye.
83|4|Sihamte bisbasa nakarae neki ye, sihamta puranaraut'thita ha’ba
83|5|mahadirasata.
83|6|Yidina sakalo manuhe bisbajagatara pratipalakara sanmukhata thiya ha’ba.
83|7|Ketiya'o nahaya, niscaya papisakalara amalanama chijjinata ache.
83|8|Arau kihe tomaka janaba chijjina ki
83|9|cihnita amalanama.
83|10|Se'idina dhbansa asbikarakaraisakalara babe
83|11|yihamte pratidana dirasaka asbikara karae.
83|12|Arau kerala pratyeka papistha simalanghanakaraira bahirae ana kone'o iyaka asbikara nakarae.
83|13|Arau yetiya amara ayatasamuha tara ocarata tilarata karaa haya tetiya si kaya, (eya haiche) ‘purbarartisakalara upakatha’.
83|14|Ketiya'o nahaya, sihamtara karmara phalata sihamtara antarata mamara dharaiche.
83|15|Ketiya'o nahaya, niscaya sihamta se'idina nija pratipalakara paraa pardara amrata thakiba.
83|16|Tara pichata niscaya sihamte prajjbalita jahannamata praraesa karaiba
83|17|tara pichata koraa ha’ba, ‘e'itorae se'ito yaka tomaloke asbikara karaichila’.
83|18|Ketiya'o nahaya, niscaya punyabanalokasakalara amalanama thakiba illiyyinata.
83|19|Arau kihe tomaka janaba illiyyina ki
83|20|cihnita amalanama.
83|21|Sannidhyapraaptasakale'i iyara abalokana karae.
83|22|Niscaya punyabanasakale'i thakiba parama sukha-santita
83|23|susajjita asanata bahi darsana karaiba.
83|24|Tumi sihamtara mukhamandalata sukha-santira ujjalata dekhibalai paba
83|25|sihamtaka mohara marai thoraa bisud'dha paniya pana karaoraa ha’ba
83|26|arau yara mohara ha'ba michakara, seye e'i bisaye pratiyogisakale pratiyogita karaa ucita.
83|27|Arau iyara misrana ha’ba tachanimara
83|28|(se'ito) eta nijaraa, yara paraa sannidhyasakale pana karaiba.
83|29|Niscaya yihamte aparaadha karaiche sihamte muminasakalaka upahasa karaichila
83|30|arau yetiya sihamte muminasakalara ocaraedi gaichila tetiya sihamte caku tipi bidraupa karaichila.
83|31|Arau yetiya sihamte aponajanara ocaralai ubhati ahichila tetiya utphallita hai ubhatichila
83|32|arau sihamte yetiya muminasakalaka dekhichila tetiya kaichila, ‘niscaya ihamta pathabhrasta’.
83|33|Athaca sihamtaka muminasakalara tattbabadhayaka hicape pathoraa horaa na'i.
83|34|Eteke aji muminasakale upahasa karaiba kaphirasakalaka.
83|35|Susajjita asanata bahi sihamte ca'i thakiba.
83|36|Kaphirasakale sihamtara krtakarmara phala palene
